name: Isaac H. Kim
content: Isaac H. Kim I work in the field of Quantum Information and Quantum Computation. My research goal is to understand fundamental aspects of quantum entanglement that appear in nature. I have a fairly broad interest in anything quantum. I have worked on the following topics. Topological Order Quantum Error Correction Quantum Algorithms Black-hole information paradox Matrix Analysis These days, I am primarily focused on these topics.
